title: SUNNY SHOWER Semi-Frameless Shower Door Glass Sliding Design Bathroom Shower Enclosure 1/4" Clear Glass, Brushed Nickel Finish, 60" x 72" Glass Shower Door
features: ☀ Model size: 60" W x 72" H. Width adjustment range: 58.5" to 60" by cutting guide rail.Hardware Finish: Brushed Nickel
☀ 2 Ways Opening: Both 2 glass door panels sliding and reversible for "right" or "left" installation. With long towel bar and 2 inner knobs, you can open/close the glass door easily
☀ Waterproof – High quality glass door bottom seal strip stop water leaking out, no need cleaning the bathroom outside
☀ Safe to Use: Consists of top quality aluminum material frame and tempered clear glass certified by ANSI, safe to use
☀ Silent Sliding: Using the special roller and guide design, here is no noise while opening and closing the door. Your families can have a good rest
description: The double sliding shower door is semi-frameless, with 1/4" thickness tempered clear and reversible installation glass panel, it can slide 2 ways as you like. It also has a long towel bar and 2 inner knobs to open/close the door, very beautiful and convenient! All hardware are good quality and glass also certified by ANSI, SAFE to use! Enjoy your bathing time, start from owning a beautiful and fashion SUNNY SHOWER Brand shower door! - Product Description: - 60 x 72 inch glass sliding door, width adjustment range: 58.5" - 60" - 2 sliding door, reversible installation - long towel bar and 2 inner knobs, convenient for open/close the door - 1/4" tempered clear glass with round glass corners, easy to clean and safe to use- High quality PVC material seal strips, prevent water leaking  Package Includes:  Sliding Glass Panel X 2  Long Towel Bar X 1  Door knob X 2  Installation Guide X 1  Other accessories packages
